--   
--

-- | <a>GetConfig</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--

--   <li><a>gcClientArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>

--   </ul>

gcClientArn :: Lens' GetConfig Text

-- | Retrieves information about an HSM. You can identify the HSM by its
--   ARN or its serial number.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloudhsm/latest/dg/API_DescribeHsm.html</a>
module Network.AWS.CloudHSM.DescribeHsm
data DescribeHsm

-- | <a>DescribeHsm</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dh1HsmArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dh1HsmSerialNumber</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
describeHsm :: DescribeHsm

-- | The ARN of the HSM. Either the <i>HsmArn</i> or the
--   <i>SerialNumber</i> parameter must be specified.
dh1HsmArn :: Lens' DescribeHsm (Maybe Text)

-- | The serial number of the HSM. Either the <i>HsmArn</i> or the
--   <i>HsmSerialNumber</i> parameter must be specified.
dh1HsmSerialNumber :: Lens' DescribeHsm (Maybe Text)

--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2SshPublicKey</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2Status</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>HsmStatus</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2StatusDetails</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2SubnetId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2SubscriptionEndDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2SubscriptionStartDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2SubscriptionType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>SubscriptionType</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2VendorName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhr2VpcId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
describeHsmResponse :: DescribeHsmResponse

-- | The Availability Zone that the HSM is in.
dhr2AvailabilityZone :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier of the elastic network interface (ENI) attached to the
--   HSM.
dhr2EniId :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The IP address assigned to the HSM's ENI.
dhr2EniIp :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the HSM.
dhr2HsmArn :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The HSM model type.
dhr2HsmType :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the IAM role assigned to the HSM.
dhr2IamRoleArn :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of partitions on the HSM.
dhr2Partitions :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse [Text]

-- | The serial number of the HSM.
dhr2SerialNumber :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The date and time the server certificate was last updated.
dhr2ServerCertLastUpdated :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The URI of the certificate server.
dhr2ServerCertUri :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The HSM software version.
dhr2SoftwareVersion :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The date and time the SSH key was last updated.
dhr2SshKeyLastUpdated :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The public SSH key.
dhr2SshPublicKey :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The status of the HSM.
dhr2Status :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe HsmStatus)

-- | Contains additional information about the status of the HSM.
dhr2StatusDetails :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier of the subnet the HSM is in.
dhr2SubnetId :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The subscription end date.
dhr2SubscriptionEndDate :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The subscription start date.
dhr2SubscriptionStartDate :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The subscription type.
dhr2SubscriptionType :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe SubscriptionType)

-- | The name of the HSM vendor.
dhr2VendorName :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier of the VPC that the HSM is in.
dhr2VpcId :: Lens' DescribeHsmResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq DescribeHsm
instance Ord DescribeHsm
instance Read DescribeHsm
instance Show DescribeHsm
instance Eq DescribeHsmResponse
instance Read DescribeHsmResponse
instance Show DescribeHsmResponse
instance FromJSON DescribeHsmResponse
instance AWSRequest DescribeHsm
instance ToJSON DescribeHsm
instance ToHeaders DescribeHsm
instance ToQuery DescribeHsm
instance ToPath DescribeHsm


-- | Retrieves information about a high-availability partition group.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloudhsm/latest/dg/API_DescribeHapg.html</a>
module Network.AWS.CloudHSM.DescribeHapg
data DescribeHapg

-- | <a>DescribeHapg</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dh1HapgArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
describeHapg :: Text -> DescribeHapg

-- | The ARN of the high-availability partition group to describe.
dh1HapgArn :: Lens' DescribeHapg Text
data DescribeHapgResponse

-- | <a>DescribeHapgResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dhrHapgArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhrHapgSerial</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhrHsmsLastActionFailed</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>dhrHsmsPendingDeletion</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>dhrHsmsPendingRegistration</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>dhrLabel</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhrLastModifiedTimestamp</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dhrPartitionSerialList</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>dhrState</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>CloudHsmObjectState</a></li>
--   </ul>
describeHapgResponse :: DescribeHapgResponse

-- | The ARN of the high-availability partition group.
dhrHapgArn :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The serial number of the high-availability partition group.
dhrHapgSerial :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse (Maybe Text)
dhrHsmsLastActionFailed :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse [Text]
dhrHsmsPendingDeletion :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse [Text]
dhrHsmsPendingRegistration :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse [Text]

-- | The label for the high-availability partition group.
dhrLabel :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The date and time the high-availability partition group was last
--   modified.
dhrLastModifiedTimestamp :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The list of partition serial numbers that belong to the
--   high-availability partition group.
dhrPartitionSerialList :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse [Text]

-- | The state of the high-availability partition group.
dhrState :: Lens' DescribeHapgResponse (Maybe CloudHsmObjectState)
instance Eq DescribeHapg
instance Ord DescribeHapg
instance Read DescribeHapg
instance Show DescribeHapg
instance Monoid DescribeHapg
instance IsString DescribeHapg
instance Eq DescribeHapgResponse
instance Read DescribeHapgResponse
instance Show DescribeHapgResponse
instance FromJSON DescribeHapgResponse
instance AWSRequest DescribeHapg
instance ToJSON DescribeHapg
instance ToHeaders DescribeHapg
instance ToQuery DescribeHapg
instance ToPath DescribeHapg

--   </ul>

--   </ul>

-- | Creates an HSM client.

module Network.AWS.CloudHSM.CreateLunaClient
data CreateLunaClient

-- | <a>CreateLunaClient</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>clcCertificate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>clcLabel</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
createLunaClient :: Text -> CreateLunaClient

-- | The contents of a Base64-Encoded X.509 v3 certificate to be installed
--   on the HSMs used by this client.
clcCertificate :: Lens' CreateLunaClient Text

-- | The label for the client.
clcLabel :: Lens' CreateLunaClient (Maybe Text)
data CreateLunaClientResponse

-- | <a>CreateLunaClientResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>clcrClientArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
createLunaClientResponse :: CreateLunaClientResponse

-- | The ARN of the client.
clcrClientArn :: Lens' CreateLunaClientResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq CreateLunaClient
instance Ord CreateLunaClient
instance Read CreateLunaClient
instance Show CreateLunaClient
instance Eq CreateLunaClientResponse
instance Ord CreateLunaClientResponse
instance Read CreateLunaClientResponse
instance Show CreateLunaClientResponse
instance Monoid CreateLunaClientResponse
instance FromJSON CreateLunaClientResponse
instance AWSRequest CreateLunaClient
instance ToJSON CreateLunaClient
instance ToHeaders CreateLunaClient
instance ToQuery CreateLunaClient
instance ToPath CreateLunaClient


-- | Creates an uninitialized HSM instance. Running this command provisions
--   an HSM appliance and will result in charges to your AWS account for
--   the HSM.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloudhsm/latest/dg/API_CreateHsm.html</a>
module Network.AWS.CloudHSM.CreateHsm
data CreateHsm

-- | <a>CreateHsm</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>chClientToken</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>chEniIp</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>chExternalId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>chIamRoleArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>chSshKey</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>chSubnetId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>chSubscriptionType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>SubscriptionType</a></li>
--   <li><a>chSyslogIp</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
createHsm :: Text -> Text -> Text -> SubscriptionType -> CreateHsm

-- | A user-defined token to ensure idempotence. Subsequent calls to this
--   action with the same token will be ignored.
chClientToken :: Lens' CreateHsm (Maybe Text)

-- | The IP address to assign to the HSM's ENI.
chEniIp :: Lens' CreateHsm (Maybe Text)

-- | The external ID from IamRoleArn, if present.
chExternalId :: Lens' CreateHsm (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of an IAM role to enable the AWS CloudHSM service to allocate
--   an ENI on your behalf.
chIamRoleArn :: Lens' CreateHsm Text

-- | The SSH public key to install on the HSM.
chSshKey :: Lens' CreateHsm Text

-- | The identifier of the subnet in your VPC in which to place the HSM.
chSubnetId :: Lens' CreateHsm Text

-- | The subscription type.
chSubscriptionType :: Lens' CreateHsm SubscriptionType

-- | The IP address for the syslog monitoring server.
chSyslogIp :: Lens' CreateHsm (Maybe Text)
data CreateHsmResponse

-- | <a>CreateHsmResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>chrHsmArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
createHsmResponse :: CreateHsmResponse

-- | The ARN of the HSM.
chrHsmArn :: Lens' CreateHsmResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq CreateHsm
instance Read CreateHsm
instance Show CreateHsm
instance Eq CreateHsmResponse
instance Ord CreateHsmResponse
instance Read CreateHsmResponse
instance Show CreateHsmResponse
instance Monoid CreateHsmResponse
instance FromJSON CreateHsmResponse
instance AWSRequest CreateHsm
instance ToJSON CreateHsm
instance ToHeaders CreateHsm
instance ToQuery CreateHsm
instance ToPath CreateHsm


-- | Creates a high-availability partition group. A high-availability
--   partition group is a group of partitions that spans multiple physical
--   HSMs.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cloudhsm/latest/dg/API_CreateHapg.html</a>
module Network.AWS.CloudHSM.CreateHapg
data CreateHapg

-- | <a>CreateHapg</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>chLabel</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
createHapg :: Text -> CreateHapg

-- | The label of the new high-availability partition group.
chLabel :: Lens' CreateHapg Text
data CreateHapgResponse

-- | <a>CreateHapgResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>chrHapgArn</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
createHapgResponse :: CreateHapgResponse

-- | The ARN of the high-availability partition group.
chrHapgArn :: Lens' CreateHapgResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq CreateHapg
instance Ord CreateHapg
instance Read CreateHapg
instance Show CreateHapg
instance Monoid CreateHapg
instance IsString CreateHapg
instance Eq CreateHapgResponse
instance Ord CreateHapgResponse
instance Read CreateHapgResponse
instance Show CreateHapgResponse
instance Monoid CreateHapgResponse
instance FromJSON CreateHapgResponse
instance AWSRequest CreateHapg
instance ToJSON CreateHapg
instance ToHeaders CreateHapg
instance ToQuery CreateHapg
instance ToPath CreateHapg


-- | The AWS CloudHSM service helps you meet corporate, contractual and
--   regulatory compliance requirements for data security by using
--   dedicated Hardware Security Module (HSM) appliances within the AWS
--   cloud. With CloudHSM, you control the encryption keys and
--   cryptographic operations performed by the HSM.
module Network.AWS.CloudHSM
